channel.title: Tanzu Portfolio on ModernApps Ninja Home
channel.description: Recent content in Tanzu Portfolio on ModernApps Ninja Home

item.title: Study Guide for the Certified Kubernetes Administrator(CKA)
item.description: About This ModernApps Ninja Guide This study guide aims to help learners prepare for the Certified Kubernetes Administrator(CKA) exam.

item.title: Getting started with K8S on vSphere
item.description: Goal of this presentation was to get the audience up to speed in deploying & configuring vSphere with Tanzu

item.title: Introduction to vSAN Data Persistence Platform (DPp)
item.description: How can we allow modern applications to do what they do best, but still provide the ease of use and transparent operations of the VMware platform to admins and developers?

item.title: Deploying Tanzu SQL to Tanzu Kubernetes Grid Clusters
item.description: This is a demonstration of how to get Tanzu SQL configured utilising Tanzu Kubernetes Grid clusters, to provide a relational database-as-a-service function.

item.title: Tanzu Mission Control Data Protection and vSphere with Tanzu support.
item.description: Introduction about TMC Data Protection and Tanzu Kubernetes Grid on vSphere 7 support.

item.title: TKG Cluster Lifecycle on vSphere with TMC & TMC CLI
item.description: TKG Cluster Lifecycle on vSphere with Tanzu via TMC & TMC CLI

item.title: vSphere with Tanzu 101
item.description: About Course vSphere with Tanzu: application-focused management for streamlined development, agile operations, and accelerated innovation.

item.title: vSphere with Tanzu 201
item.description: About Course vSphere with Tanzu: application-focused management for streamlined development, agile operations, and accelerated innovation.

item.title: Verify and Troubleshoot vSphere 7 with Kubernetes
item.description: Verify and Troubleshoot vSphere 7 with Kubernetes

item.title: Introduction to the VMware Tanzu Portfolio
item.description: This course provides a high level introduction to the the Tanzu Family of products, the vision for the portfolio, and a brief introduction to each of the products & solutions in the portfolio.

item.title: Tanzu Kubernetes Grid 101
item.description: About Course This Course provides an introductory technical overview of VMware Tanzu Kubernetes Grid including all editions.

item.title: Tanzu Mission Control 101
item.description: About Course This course provides an introduction to VMware Tanzu Mission Control.

item.title: Tanzu Mission Control 201
item.description: About Course Tanzu Mission Control 201 follows the TMC 101 course to provide the next level of technical overview and hands on exercises exploring the features of Tanzu Mission ControlRequirements Before taking this course, please complete the Tanzu Mission Control 101 Course

item.title: ModernApps Ninja Hugo Tag and Category Registry
item.description: About this document This Document is the central source of tags and categories that can be used on the modernapps.
